articles.title: Vacation-Home Buyers Propped Up the Mortgage Market. Now They Face a Test. - The Wall Street Journal

articles.content:
The pandemic set in motion a furious scramble to buy vacation homes. Now, curbs on financing those purchases will test that markets resilience.
